          com.redhat.rhn.frontend.taglibs.VirtualListDisplayTag

public class VirtualListDisplayTag
extends ListDisplayTag

The VirtualListDisplayTag defines the structure of the ListView when viewing virtual systems and their hosts.

See Also:

Method Detail

getTrElement

protected java.lang.String getTrElement(java.lang.Object o)
We need to override getTrElement because we are doing two different 'levels' of background color. One for the 'host' systems, and another for the 'virtual' systems.
